import React from 'react'; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Row} from 'reactstrap'; import classnames from 'classnames'; import './NavPrices.css' export default class NavPrices extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.state = { activeTab: '1' }; } toggle(tab) { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }); } } render() { return (
